name: One Foot In... limited edition screenprint
description:
If you know me, you know I hate horror movies. I do, however, draw a lot of things about death and graves. My drawings always have a hopeful outlook on things though. Here, an old man is being greeted by a messenger from underground. Is the blue ghost easing his fears? Coaching him? I'll leave that up to you to decide.

This is a five color screenprint. One of the colors is transparent, which creates the illusion of more colors when it overlays the colors beneath it.
Signed and numbered, limited edition of 50.
Heavyweight white paper. 
19" x 25"

name: "First American" limited edition screenprint
description:
Who doesn't love Ben Franklin? Who doesn't love Ben Franklin covered in tattoos? All your dreams have come true, because this Ben Franklin is tattooed with notable accomplishments of his life. Like writing "Poor Richard's Almanac", or inventing bifocals, and of course the famous kite in a storm.

This is a four color screenprint. Printed by hand.
Signed and numbered, limited edition of 50.
Printed on 100lb. French Paper.
12.5" x 19"
